      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(WayPoint a)
        Parameters:
        a - a waypoint that is used to calculate the distance between the current waypoint and waypoint a
        Returns:
        a double value equivalent to the distance between the current waypoint and waypoint a

      • getHeuristic

        public double getHeuristic()
        Returns:
        returns the absolute distance from this waypoint to the destination

      • setCurrentCost

        public void setCurrentCost(WayPoint a)
        variable used in A* algorithm that keeps track of the total distance that the bot has traversed up until this point
        Parameters:
        a - WayPoint used to determine the distance from the current waypoint to waypoint a

      • getCurrentCost

        public double getCurrentCost()
        Returns:
        the cumulative traversal cost of this waypoint's parent plus the cost to get from that parent to this waypoint

      • getDistances

        public double getDistances(int i)
        Returns the distance from the current waypoint to one of it's neighbors denoted by index i
        Parameters:
        i - index of the neighbor who's distance you want to retrieve
        Returns:
        double value of the distance between current waypoint and it's i-th neighbor

      • setVisitedMap

        public void setVisitedMap()
        Gets called if a player has picked up this waypoint's map is used as a flag to tell if this waypoint's map has already been used so that the player does not get stuck in an endless loop

      • getVisitedMap

        public boolean getVisitedMap()
        Returns:
        returns the status of the map control flag, see setVisitedMap() for more details

      • setGoldGone

        public void setGoldGone()
        This is called when a player traverses a waypoint that has gold. It is used to keep track of where the player has been

      • getGoldGone

        public boolean getGoldGone()
        Returns:
        Once a map has been collected, this method is called to find out if the player has already collected the gold that the map linked to

      • getMapXY

        public java.lang.String getMapXY()
        Returns:
        a string formated in such a way that it can be used as a hashmap key

        public void setValue()
        Sets the value that the priority queue utilizes for the comapareTo method

        public double getValue()
